tags: just a lil love note to the fandom
ive been drawing SO MUCH the past few days and i wanted to take a moment to appreciate myself for being creative
and i appreciate you!! so pls take a moment to appreciate yourself!!
summary: Just want to take a moment to say:
body:
Just want to take a moment to say:

If you’re creating content, I’m so proud of you.

Whether it’s creating fic, art, videos, photo edits, moodboards, etc —

Whether you’re just starting out or you’ve been doing it forever —

Whether you strongly identify as a creator or it’s just a casual hobby —

Whether you put out content every week or once in a blue moon —

I’m proud of you!

It can be hard to create when you’re hard on yourself. But keep at it for the sake of doing what you love, even if the end product isn’t what you wanted it to be.

Art doesn’t have to be perfect to be good!

Progress often isn’t linear!

So keep creating.

Your contributions are appreciated. ❤️

summary: Grateful - Tyrus
body:
Grateful - Tyrus

this my first tyrus fanfic and my first time writing in about a year so yeah enjoy I guess

“Grateful”

Trigger Warning: mention of self harm and abuse. stay safe 💕

Cyrus knew TJ wouldn’t like him back. So he kept that idea in his mind, that is, until the jock revealed his own truth.

The two boys were working on homework at TJ’s house, but then TJ had to get something off his chest.

“Cyrus. I need to tell you something. It can’t wait any longer.” TJ said, with a deep breath.

“Yeah?”

“I like you. As in, like like you. You’ve made me a better person. You’re so incredible and I can’t resist you. I know it’s sudden and I’m rambling but—“ TJ blurted.

Cyrus couldn’t believe what he was hearing. So he reacted. He grabbed TJ’s hand and whispered, “I like you too.”

The two looked into each other’s eyes, then at each other’s lips. They leaned in at the same time and locked lips.

“That’s how it’s supposed to feel.” Cyrus said to himself as he felt his heart beat a mile a minute.

Cyrus then look down at TJ’s arm. He saw bruises and scars.

“Teej…” Cyrus said softly.

“It’s nothing, Underdog. Just part of my ‘stuff’ ya know?”

“Elaborate please.” Cyrus pleaded.

“I used to cut. Back when my mental health wasn’t so great. The bruises are from my dad being a drunk idiot. I used to cut because I thought I wasn’t good enough for anyone. Not for my parents, for my friends. But then you came along and listened to my problems, without judgement. You listened and cared, more than anyone else. You don’t know how fucking grateful I am for you Cyrus Goodman.” TJ revealed while choking on tears.

Cyrus was silent. TJ shed a tear, Cyrus wiped it away, and kissed TJ’s forehead.

“TJ Kippen…you don’t know how much I love you. You’re the tough guy who let his walls down for the geek with good hair. You let me in and let me help you. You’ve helped me face my fears and overcome obstacles without judging my lack of athleticism. I can’t imagine what I’d be like if you hadn’t changed my life.” Cyrus said holding back tears.

The boys cuddled close and made a promise to never let go.

blog.description:
Tyrus is endgame.

Muffy is endgame.

Wonah is endgame

Jonah and mental stability is endgame.

The end.

summary: Alright, I’ve been seeing people counter the “no other character on this show is as over dramatic as Andi” thing with “so what...
body:
Alright, I’ve been seeing people counter the “no other character on this show is as over dramatic as Andi” thing with “so what she has her flaws. Every character has flaws, but nobody hates them for doing there’s. And of course they’re not gonna act like Andi because they’re not her, and they don’t have her flaws”

And ok I get that, lord knows all of the people on this show have flaws.

Buffy gets way too competitive to the point of just being mean.

Cyrus is constantly forcing his friends to make nice with people they don’t like, to the point where nothing is really getting resolved so much as angry and hurt feelings are just being repressed and ignored

Jonah is confusing and messy and sends too many mixed signals and needs to learn to stop being so oblivious. And that his being oblivious is not an excuse for his mixed signals and leading people on.

But Buffy just wants to be the best for her mom, and when she realizes she’s taken it too far she is capable of owning up to that (well…she’s working on that)

Cyrus just wants everyone to get along and hates conflict, he’s sweet and pure and has everyone’s best interest at heart.

Jonah never meant to hurt neither Andi or Amber, and was trying his hardest to figure out his own feelings, he screwed up and made some mistakes.

They all made mistakes. But we forgave them. Because we knew they all had a pure and good intention in their hearts.

Andi is screwing up, maybe we will forgive her. Maybe we won’t.

We know she’s just a teen with flaws, but it’s our right to pick whether or not we think those flaws are forgivable. Whether we wanna deal with a character who does this type of thing. All of our favorites have the flaws, and we love them despite that.

But trust me, if the situation were reversed and Andi started dating Marty, and Buffy was being this messy and confusing and over dramatic. We would be pissed too.

If Cyrus told Buffy that he liked Walker, and she proceeded to never even think about that facts and just ignore her friends feelings completely and kiss walker right in front of him. We would be pissed.

Yeah Andi is just “trying her best to deal with the craziness that’s happening in her life” but don’t get mad at us just because we don’t think that’s good enough.

summary:
I can see the pain behind your eyes
It’s been there for quite awhile
I just wanna be the one to remind you what it is to smile
I...
body:
I can see the pain behind your eyes

It’s been there for quite awhile

I just wanna be the one to remind you what it is to smile

I would like to show you what true love can really do

Let me love you

And I will love you

Until you learn to love yourself.

Until you learn to love yourself.

I just wanna be the one to remind you what it is to smile

I would like to show you what true love can really do

Let me love you

And I will love you

Until you learn to love yourself.

summary: didn’t whatever that shows name is get cancelled cause it was so bad and they show episodes of bunkd every day and it’s SO bad...
question: didn’t whatever that shows name is get cancelled cause it was so bad and they show episodes of bunkd every day and it’s SO bad and it even got a season four when they give andi mack a hiatus every episode for no reason
answer:
it’s all relative i think. We think those shows are shit, sure, but obviously the kids that watch them don’t. I thought Dog With a Blog was the dumbest, worst show on Disney a few years ago and my little sister LOVED it, same with Jessie. When I was growing up I loved Wizards of Waverly Place, Hannah Montana, Suite Life/On Deck, but my older sister thought they were all dumb. And i continue to like them for the nostalgia (i will always claim they are better than what they have now for comedies) but in 5-7 years kids will claim whatever is on disney then is dumb and when they were 9 Bunk’d was the ‘best show’.

It’s just called getting older and growing out of the ‘kids humour’. Also because Disney’s target audience for their comedies slowly gets younger and younger, it becomes more obvious how dumb some of those shows are as you grow up.

Andi Mack is a weird exception because it isn’t apart of the ‘laugh productions’ studio. It’s a drama, so anyone of any age that’s been in middle school can relate to it. It’s hard to compare because these types of shows on Disney are so few and far in between. Andi Mack is the one (1) of its decade and the only two i can remember from last decade were Lizzie and Even Stevens

At the end of the day, Disney is a capitalist company. They’re going to push what makes them money so if Bunkd is making them money, it gets a season 4. Andi Mack is SO good and it’s literally groundbreaking for Disney Channel, but that’s not always immediately a good thing. Groundbreaking doesn’t make money, it’s risky. They worry about it on their network being so ‘different’ and the fact that they keep pulling it and switching it around shows they have no idea what to do with it. 

In way too many words, there’s your answer. Bunkd + other shows we find annoying: cheap and ‘funny’ to kids, can draw in disney’s whole target audience = promoted by disney and on 24/7. 

Andi Mack: expensive out in Utah + loses half it’s potential audience due to controversial topics = disney panics and had no idea how to promote it

summary: i honestly can't think of a better time for something official to happen between tj and cyrus than in 3x7
body:
i honestly can’t think of a better time for something official to happen between tj and cyrus than in 3x7

it’s the last episode of 2018, meaning we won’t get any more content until january, maybe even february if they decide to prolong it. leaving a huge cliffhanger there and picking it up in 3x8 is the absolute perfect way to reel in more viewers and leave us all with our wigs snatched.

let’s face it: there’s nothing else that we know of that cyrus could “come clean” about. the gun issue isn’t necessarily a secret to anyone and doesn’t really have to be?

i don’t want to get anyone’s hopes up, including mine, but i genuinely think something’s going to happen in 3x7 that will leave us in a state very similar to:
